remarks: The law of concretion.  Theorem 9.5 of [Quine] p. 61.  (Contributed by NM, 16-May-1995.)
statement:
opelopab.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
opelopab.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
opelopab.3 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
opelopab.4 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
opelopab $p |- ( <. A , B >. e. { <. x , y >. | ph } <-> ch ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d ch x y $.
